data.text: Ia gumazir dapaniba, ia kotiabar deragha biziba baragha dav gei, o?
Ian nɨghnɨziba arazir kurabara damuasa dɨkafi.
Gumazir arazir kurabagh amiba, me mangamin tuavim ataki.
Men mɨgɨrɨgɨaba mati, kuruzimɨn aven itir imezir kuram dagh izɨfa.
Kuruziba oraghtɨ, gumazim marvim givitɨ, kuruzir kaba dɨkavigh ighiam.
O God, nɨ arazir kurabagh amir gumazir kabagh asɨghasɨkigh.
Nɨ me damightɨ, me dɨpam nguazimɨn aven uaghiri moghɨn mangɨ pura puvatɨgh.
Nɨ me damutɨ, me demdembar mɨn arɨmɨghiregh puvatɨgh.
Gumazim temer muziarim voroghɨrama anetuzɨ moghɨn, God bar zuamɨra me gasɨghasigham.
God, gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amibagh asɨghasɨgham.
Gumazir igharaziba uaghan ganigh fogh suam,
